src:
Jokić i Mari vodili Denver do preokreta, trojka Siksersa u poslednjim stotinkama za pobedu [VIDEO]
03 Nov 2019, 09:39 by Nemanja
Košarkaši Denver Nagetsa savladali su ekipu Orlando Medžika rezultatom 91:87 i tako ostvarili četvrtu pobedu u sezoni.
Utakmica koja nije obilovala velikim brojem poena uglavnom je bila pod kontrolom ekipe iz Floride (prim.aut. imali i +12), ali Denver je uz pomoć Nikole Jokića, koji je odigrao sjajno drugo poluvreme, uspeo da dođe do novog trijumfa u sezoni.
Njemu se pridružio Džamal Mari, koji je postigao 22 poena, a Jokić je posle prvog poluvremena pružio znatno bolju partiju i na kraju meč okončao sa 20 poena, sedam skokova i četiri asistencije. Ekipu Orlanda predvodio je Nikola Vuević sa 25 postignuta poena.



Filadelfija ima razloga za zadovoljstvo i veliki optimizam u ovoj sezoni. Rokijev grad za sada ima jedinu ekipu u NBA ligi koja nije doživela niti jedan poraz. Ovog puta, Seventisiksersi su savladali Portland Trajlblejzerse u derbi meču, u utakmici gde su igrači Portlanda imali od prvog minuta, pa sve do četiri stotinke pre kraja utakmice. Al Harford je za pobednički sastav postigao 25 poena, dok je u timu Portlanda najefikasniji bio Demijan Lilard sa 33.



Finiks Sansi igraju veoma dobro u ovoj sezoni NBA lige i protiv Memfis Grizlisa zabeležili su i četvrti trijumf u šestoj odigranoj utakmici. Ponovo je glavna karika bio Devin Buker, dok se Dža Morant istakao u ekipi Memfisa. Srpski košarkaš Marko Gudurić je za nešto više od 12 minuta postigao dva poena, uz osam skokova i dve asistencije.




Oklahoma siti Tander – Nju Orelans Pelikans 115:104

Dentroit Pistons – Bruklin Nets 113:109

Orlando Medžik – Denver Nagets 87:91

Memfis Grizlis – Finiks Sans 105:114

Milvoki Baks – Toronto Reptors 115:105

Vašington Vizards – Minesota Timbervulfs 109:131

Golden stejt Voriors – Šarlot Hornets 87:93

Portland Trajlblejzers – Filadelfija Seventisiksers 128:129


POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Jokic and Marie lead Denver to a turnaround, Sikers three in last hundred to win [VIDEO]
03 Nov 2019, 09:39 by Nemanja
The Denver Nagets basketball team defeated Orlando Medzic by a score of 91-87, earning their fourth straight win of the season.
The game, which did not have a lot of points, was mostly controlled by the Florida team (prim.aut. They had +12), but Denver, with the help of Nikola Jokic, who played a great second half, managed to get another triumph in the season.
He was joined by Jamal Mara, who scored 22 points, and Jokic provided a much better game after the first half and ended the match with 20 points, seven rebounds and four assists. The Orlando team was led by Nikola Vuevic with 25 points.



Philadelphia has reason to be pleased and very optimistic this season. Rocky City has the only team in the NBA to date that has not suffered a single defeat. This time, the Seventhixers defeated the Portland Trailblazers in a derby match, in a game where Portland players had their first minutes up to four hundred before the end of the game. Al Harford scored 25 points for the winning squad, while Demian Lillard with 33 was the most efficient on the Portland team.



The Phoenix Sans are playing very well this season in the NBA and against the Memphis Grizzlies they also recorded their fourth triumph in the sixth game played. Again, the main link was Devin Booker, while Ja Morant stood out on the Memphis team. Serbian basketball player Marko Guduric scored two points in just over 12 minutes, with eight rebounds and two assists.




Oklahoma City Thunder - New Orelans Pelicans 115: 104

Dentroit Pistons - Brooklyn Nets 113: 109

Orlando Medzhik - Denver Nagets 87:91

Memphis Grizzlies - Phoenix Sans 105: 114

Milwaukee Bucks - Toronto Reptors 115: 105

Washington Wizards - Minnesota Timberwulfs 109: 131

Golden State Warriors - Charlotte Hornets 87:93

Portland Trailblazers - Philadelphia Seventisiksers 128: 129
